column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////Came on a Friday night
column2: wasn't packed and everything was spaced out. The pig candy was delicious! Might come back just for that. The drinks and shots were great as well. I had The Bosscat cocktail
column3: was strong and delicious. I also tried the Surviving The Times cocktail and wow
column4: who would've thought about peanut brittle in a drink
column5: loved it! Chicken sausage pasta and 12 hour beef short rib were pretty good as well! Totally coming back!
